more.description:
Overview/Purpose: AR Accountant is responsible for recording all transactions related to collection/payment of company; checking all VAT invoice and receipt from stores matched with system and record revenue daily. AR Accountant will be responsible for providing services in an effective and efficient manner, ensure that municipal finances are accurate and up to date.
Responsibility: - Manage accounts receivable o Update revenue and reconcile with POS, retail pro system o Daily VAT invoice controlling and update on the system o Daily control and record all receipts from cashier stores o Daily post customer payments by recording cash, checks and credit card transactions. o Follow all debt from staffs (advance), suppliers, stores, customers o Record and update account bank/cash on daily basic o Manage/filling all documents related receivable transaction following by regulations o AR confirmation monthly with customers o Resolve invoice issues in a timely and complete manner o Accomplish accounting and organization mission by completing related results as needed. o Cooperate with AP for cash forecast during a week/quarterly
- Reporting o Daily sales report from stores by 10:30 AM every working days o F & B Weekly sales report for the best sales items, worse sales, by hours – 11AM Thursday o Retail sales best sales, worse by vendors – 11AM Thursday o Monthly revenue, discount reporting and reconciliation sheet.
- Other works or projects to be assigned by Chief Accountant / Finance Manager from time to time o Cash withdrawn from bank o Ad hoc reporting o Cash management
more.requirement: - University Degree in Finance and Accounting or related fields - Minimum of 2 years of work experience. - Computer literate with excellent Excel and familiar using MISA/FAST accounting software is preferred. - Fair in written and spoken English - Trust worthy, honest, careful, and ethical - Able to work independently - Good communication skills, team work - Working day: from Monday to Friday.
